Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav won the Player of the Match award for his half-century that helped India score 213/7 in the first T20I.
Riyan Parag picked up three wickets and was the pick of the bowlers in the series opener.
Ravi Bishnoi contributed three wickets and was adjudged as the Man of the Match in the second T20I.
India won the second T20I with 7 wickets in hand, thanks to Suryakumar Yadav, Yashasvi Jaiswal, and Hardik Pandya's unbeaten 22-run effort.
Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav-led Indian team have already won the series and will look to complete a clean sweep in the third T20I.
Under new coach Gautam Gambhir, India began the T20I series against Sri Lanka with a 43-run victory.
The third T20I will be played at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium on 30 July, Tuesday.
